description: Add/remove specific amount of exp from members.
usage: Reward users with a specific amount of exp.
Remove a specific amount of exp from a user.
userNotPremium: This feature is only available for donator. Find out more information using `donate`
inputTooHigh: Only exp between 1-20,000 can be given at once. Please change exp amount.
userNotFound: Unable to find the mentioned user, please make sure user provided is in the guild.
